text: To the great and very powerful Santa Clause I was a good puppy this year, and I will continue to be the best behaving puppy in the world. In case you need an idea for a christmas present ... Please tell Santa to stop by @Eddie

I just got a new costume and I think it resembles Santa Clause . But with the antlers I look like a reindeer, maybe I will help the real Santa Clause with his delivery. Maybe I can bring over some @Kira . What a wonderful w眉rstel-dream you had.

Today I had the most fateful dream. I was dreaming of a christmas with an amazingly well decorated salami-christmas-tree. It was the most beautiful tree in the world! Nobody has seen anything like it before, it felt like heaven. That is the real salami dream.
@Eddie I think your costume looks most amazing!
I just went for a walk. And anywhere I went, my friends and other, not so friendly dogs admired my beautiful costume. @Kira Do you also find this costume amazing?
Today I decorated the Christmas Tree! What an amazing work of art! I am truly a stable genius. When I unpack the packages I expect steak under the tree... wish me luck
I love W眉rstel. I am the best dog in the world!
I love to leave an amazingly smelling present under the table near Vera . I am quick to leave because it is very intense. Thank you for your attention to this matter!

That moment when the W眉rstel falls from the table or when I find the hidden spots of W眉rstel, Doglife is amazing. I never tell it to anybody, but I think they underestimate my genius smelling ability...
I love Steak and W眉rstel , but I am on a rice-cracker diet . Today I searched for amazing treats in Lemb枚ckgasse 61, and I could not find any... I don't like being on a diet.
Today I was very productive at work. Now I am chilling in the sun and having a bite of my favorite teddy bear
